title: The Monsters of Florence
overview: It is a cold case that after 50 years still haunts Italy today - an epic travesty of justice shrouded in mystery and deception involving he ritualistic serial murder of eight young couples in the country lanes around Florence in the 1980s.

title: Rafaela
overview: Young girl from the Dominican slums, parents drug addicts; she dreams about living somewhere else. She becomes the leader of a criminal gang; bullied for being a woman they consider transgender; Mario, a drug dealer, tries to force her to work for him. When he wins her confidence, leaves her pregnant and steals her loot, things change very quickly for Rafaela. Betrayed, she'll do whatever it takes to get revenge, avoid the police and get away before her baby is born.

title: Never Too Far Away
overview: Cici Flowers is an exotic dancer fleeing from an unfortunate incident involving guns, money, and murder. On her way to hide out at her cousin's house, she has a chance encounter with Julius and his stalker ex-fiancee. Cici runs to her cousin's home to hide out and run into Rhonda again and then Julius. When Cici and Julius re-connect, sparks begin to fly, causing a sordid love triangle between the three...  Who will come out on top?
tagline: Her past could be his worst nightmare.

title: PAINt
overview: An artist, both nervous and distracted, finds himself under interrogation for a crime he possibly did not commit, even though his hands are dyed red.
tagline: Blamed before being investigated

title: Vaaitha
overview: A poor Laundry worker gets injured in a road accident and finds himself struggling for justice. He and his family suffers, due to conflicts among two different caste groups.

title: A Dead Dame in Hollywood
overview: In the seedy world of 1940s Los Angeles, Private Detective Stone Evergreen investigates the suspicious suicide of a young actress.

title: Naroo Naroo!
overview: Criminal Justice Lawyer Julia Castro is roped into helping a Cartel Member leave and pursue his dream life. Although even after he leaves his life behind, his past will soon come back for revenge.
tagline: My Name is Selena Cruz...

title: ReTry Part 1
overview: Henry is a petty thief in his early 20s and is looking for a way out of this lifestyle. To achieve that he has to do one last job.  ReTry is series of 3 short films telling a unique heist story with a twist.

title: Filth
overview: Bloodied, bruised and left for dead a man will stop at nothing to exact gruesome revenge on those who wronged him.

title: Réfractions
overview: Under the influence of his manipulative boss, a reclusive young man is trapped in a dark and illegal enterprise that will lead him to question his morality and the very identity he once believed to be his.

title: Grimy Situation
overview: Newly paroled Camille Sanders is going straight. But, when the streets come calling and a retired FBI agent hell-bent on revenge won't give up, she'll be forced to decide between the new life in front of her or returning to her old ways.
tagline: Follow the rules? Or survive?

title: High Impact
overview: Two gangsters hire a hitman to eliminate a rival. Unbeknownst to them, the hitman is seeking an early retirement, and he intends to leave no loose ends…
tagline: You'll never know what hit you.

title: Pay Back
overview: A determined, yet clumsy figure attempts to sneakily break into someone's house for an unexpected reason.
tagline: Breaking and entering

title: Secte du temple solaire - Vercors londe de choc
overview: On December 23, 1995, the discovery of sixteen charred bodies in a small village in the Vercors region of France caused a real trauma that marked the inhabitants and, more broadly, the French. It was the first time that followers of a sect, in this case the Order of the Solar Temple, committed suicide in France. This led the authorities to create an interministerial mission to fight against cults, which would become Miviludes. The investigation of the tragedy avoids another tragedy in the Canary Islands and shows everyone the danger of cults.

title: Scraps
overview: In an alternate universe where humans and robots coexist, a gang member questions his loyalty to his anti-robot gang.
tagline: Loyalties Are Tested

title: GET OUTTA TOWN!
overview: Two Hustler cousins attempt to get over on an associate of theirs, but after the job they pulled goes wrong, the duo must leave their families and skip town.
tagline: A SoCal Sick One Crime Drama!

title: Madhurapudi Granam Ane Nenu
overview: Soori is a rude, rugged and obstinate person who can stand up for his friend Babji at all costs. Soori experiences a blossoming affection for Girija, who arrives in the village with the intent of promoting digital banking awareness.

title: Schism: Me , Myself, and Authenticity
overview: When ordering food, we often put on a happy face. But when do we take that mask off if ever? Tripp (James Counihan) faces this internal struggle while his partner Jay (Brian Westerley) confronts this dual personality.

title: Kshana Kshanam
overview: Satya is stuck in a loveless marriage, with a mediocre job while trying to stay sober. When he is introduced to an extramarital dating website, he talks to a woman named Maya. They decide to meet but things go wrong and Satya finds himself desperately trying to prove his innocence. While the life he once had was unhappy, he is now living his worst nightmare.

title: Re Mida
overview: Alessandro has a very sick father and runs a business that is on the verge of legality. The meeting with a client will rebalance the now worn relationship with his father.

title: The Box
overview: A crime transcriber realizes that the sounds from the apartment above him match the mute surveillance transmissions at work.

title: Twisted Oath
overview: After Amara and Carson's rough breakup. Amara goes to do what brings her the most peace, dancing.
tagline: Dance till you drop.

title: A Very Intense Game of Chase
overview: Captured by a notorious crime boss and held captive over a deal gone bad, A man attempts to flee with something of value to him...
tagline: WHERE'S MY MONEY?

title: Normaalii
overview: Lives of four youngsters living in East-Helsinki suburbs. Ali, Nedim, Shahin and Flamur are old friends, whose paths have gone different ways. Ali decides to do a radical change in his life, that will affect everyone.

title: Bengal Police Chapter 01: M16
overview: Plot details under wraps.

title: Checklist
overview: Larry is a man who is desperate and completely out of options. He's willing to lay it all on the line to save his terminally ill sister.

title: The Fugitive
overview: She is a lonely young woman, spending her nights drinking. He is a man on the run. They meet each other one evening in a bar. It could be the beginning of a beautiful friendship, something more or just a small moment of rest and human connection between the big events of their lives.

title: Sit With Me and Do Nothing for a While
overview: A woman meditates on her life in an 80-minute unbroken zoom shot.
tagline: Don't leave.

title: Cat and Mouse Chase
overview: A sequence of letters exchanged by a mystery killer and a Detective. Will he get what he wants?

title: Reklaw
overview: A team of altruistic vigilantes destroy evidence to keep as many people from prison as possible, but when one of their crime scene clean-ups is revisited by the killer, the strength of their convictions is tested.

title: Bequeathed
overview: A man stumbles upon a body that died reaching for something...
tagline: An unfolding mystery featuring a dead body and an idiot

title: Crabs In A Bucket
overview: The Crabs In A Bucket film is Nines' third, following on from April's Crop Circle 2 which featured cameos from Ghetts, Kojey Radical, Delilah Rose, Zeze Millz and others, and his 2018 Crop Circle film that accompanied his album of the same name.

title: “Quack”
overview: A detective lurks around a pond as she plots the destruction of the creatures behind the chaos.
tagline: Those crooked beaks and dirty feathers aren't fooling anyone.

title: Forget about me.
overview: A man with blood on his hands records a tape while awaits for his fate.

title: Chiso Ashtray
overview: A taxi driver moves to Kathmandu with aspirations of making it in the big city. He falls in with the wrong company, and soon becomes embroiled in drugs and disputes with a local rival gang.

title: She Watches from the Woods
overview: A troubled artist with a dark past attempts to make peace with her dying mother while investigating the mysterious death of her teenage sister.

title: Water Pigs
overview: Gualtieri is an apathetic ex-cop, fighting himself, almost nothing excites him. That is why he accepts an easy job in the jungle of the triple border. Investigating how and why a person was killed becomes the key to revealing other truths that should be buried under the wet red soil of the place.

title: The Man in Red
overview: A young mute hitman lured to violence by his alter ego, ‘The Man in Red’, falls for a girl, but his tendency to violence puts everything at risk.
tagline: Swim with the sharks

title: The DeMarco Crew
overview: Renowned heist master Dean DeMarco and his crew are second to none at pulling off scores. Now they face their most challenging score, rescuing Dean's ex-girlfriend.

title: Les Cendres Du Coeur
overview: A man lacks self-confidence and is increasingly afraid of seeing the woman he loves move away when he looks to the future. One day, while running in the mangroves, he finds a mysterious bag.  A woman looks to the past to understand the wrong turn their relationship may have taken.  Two couples are confronted between fantasies, memories and reality with their fascination for a mechanical object that works by combustion. This object is the origin of a fire that stimulates them as much as it could destroy them.
tagline: Sometimes, I wish I could watch the world burn, as if it was just a big bad dream

title: Red Velvet
overview: A young woman obsessed with order and perfection faces a date that does not meet her high standards. When the tension reaches its limit, the encounter takes an unexpected and lethal turn.
tagline: How far are you willing to go to keep your world impeccable?

title: The Backup Plan
overview: A group of thieves get caught attempting to steal treasures from a museum. Now they'll switch to the backup plan...

title: El club de pesca
overview: Rodrigo and Valentina, in marital and financial crisis, discover that their maid owns a valuable painting by Sorolla. In their desperation, they plunge into a web of deception as they fight to recover the painting and restore their life together.

title: L.A. Undercover
overview: Corey Shaw is a rookie cop in the LAPD with his intentions set on bettering his community. As crime ramps up in LA, Corey must go undercover to take down a cold-blooded crime-lord, Kevin "Keys" Lyles. With everything on the line, Corey battles between maintaining his relationship, doing his job, and staying true to his identity.

title: Redux
overview: In an idyllic South Icelandic village, an aimless delivery driver’s life is upended when her half-brother disappears following his wife’s suspicious demise.

title: Litvinenko: The Mayfair Poisoning
overview: A documentary surrounding the investigation into Litvinenko’s murder and the undeniable radiation health emergency. Who were the people behind the scenes who dealt with a deadly radioactive poisoning on British soil?

title: Mass Ave
overview: Over a day of landscaping work, a first generation African American and his immigrant father have their tense relationship and different outlooks on life transformed irreversibly when they are racially profiled by police.

title: End of the Line
overview: When a heist goes fatally wrong, four men held together by hope and loyalty, struggle to decide what their next move should be. As the night proceeds, they begin to realize how easily a bond of brotherhood can fall apart.
tagline: What about the money?

title: Crackdown
overview: Watch two rival gangs vie for power on a street corner selling drugs.
tagline: PARENTAL ADVISORY EXPLICIT CONTENT

title: Slog min ven Emilie Meng ihjel?
overview: Who is the man she thought she knew so well? That question has consumed a former friend of the 33-year-old man who is charged with the abduction, rape, and murder of Emilie Meng. For the first time, she shares what it is like to have been very close to the accused.

title: THE HIDDEN
overview: An experimental short film about the hidden relationships between club visitors, filmed in one shot.

title: Birdie
overview: A troubled teen takes the babysitter hostage after she uncovers his deadly plan.

title: The Merchi
overview: In a violent city, one man will fight for what he believes. His nickname is the Merchi and he enters the dark world of moneylenders and debt collectors to earn quick money to try and save his ailing father. His work as a collector requires him to press the debtors hard, but the Merchi is incapable of hurting people, which causes no end of problems with Alonso, his violent and sadistic partner.

title: Pandrikku Nandri Solli
overview: Fate brings together a cop, a gangster and an aspiring filmmaker, who hail from different places. After the initial misunderstandings and confusions between them, they form as a team and go in search of a unique pig statue and a huge sum of money. But little did they know that they would have to face unheard hurdles and riddles to possess the statue and money.

title: Catch Up
overview: A short film about walking home at night.

title: Nothing Ventured
overview: This is the story of a red suitcase and how its dramatic journey, over the course of a day, forever changes a young woman's life. A Danish crime short film in 4 chapters, shot on 4 different analog film formats: 8mm, 16mm, 35mm, and 65mm.

title: Grant Us Eyes
overview: An FBI Special Agent partners with a small town Deputy to solve a string of violent murders.

title: Fugitive
overview: Two friends committed a crime and fled in different directions. Dante, one of them, sneaks into his house to hide from the police. However, after learning the truth about what happened, fear progressively consumes him until he experiences guilt in a psychedelic extreme.
tagline: IT'S TOO LATE TO REGRET IT

title: Destination
overview: Fueled by his obsession with the past, Frank instigates a manhunt to find his former henchman Rob.
tagline: Time is not on our side

title: My City
overview: 17-year-old Eddie struggles to find his identity in a world of crime and violence. Friendships are tested and alliances are broken, as Eddie's world begins to crumble under the weight of his thirst for power.
tagline: You will pay for your actions.

title: Doomsday
overview: A youthful posse settle for drug trafficking in order to aid a friend dealing with financial stress.
tagline: The scared have no place in this hell...

title: The men of dawn
overview: Solitude and violence in the daily life of two men in Mexico City: Efraín, a violent ex-cop turned hit man, faces an existential crisis when he is given his next target: a seemingly harmless family man; Efraín will have to confront the decisions that have led him there, his loneliness and the threats of violence that he will come if he does not carry out the job. Elsewhere in the city, David, a man affected by a recent tragedy in his life, decides to cope with the solitary routine of pain by shutting himself up at home, until little by little he begins to descend into the despair of alcohol and the escapism that the window of his room gives him towards the outside world.

title: The Investigation: A Silent Film
overview: A troubled detective tries to solve the case of a murdered woman in broad daylight before his demons get the best of him.
tagline: This time there will be blood

title: The Crusaders
overview: After lending a hand to a neighborhood club owner, a bartender is inadvertently swept into the aftermath of a heist which plunges him into Manhattan's crime world. If he fails, he risks not only himself but, crucially, the love of his life.
tagline: They're young, they're broke, & they're in love.

title: La Mamita
overview: Karina is 51 years old and is a regular trucker on the north route. Due to mechanical problems, he stops for the first time at "La Mamita" restaurant. The owner and cook of the restaurant, Marta, 63, welcomes her as kindly as any of her customers. However, the accidental discovery of a human hand in the garbage makes Karina see that all the stories this cook tells her are nothing more than a premonition of her destiny.

title: Jahan
overview: Jahan always stays in dilemma between real and un-real due to her post traumatic disorder. Her husband Shihab tries to yield Jahan in normal life by hiding her trauma but keep failing due to the intensity of it. One day suddenly an accident happened. In between Jahan’s traumatic imagination and reality, the allegation falls on her where Shihab couldn’t save her anymore.

title: 3E
overview: Following the closing arguments in a murder trial, case is about to be closed as a guilty verdict with a unanimous decision. But a Jr. Lawyer casts considerable doubt on elements of the case which shall derail the total conflict threatening to question the delicate law system which will decide one girl's fate.
tagline: If Crime can find a way then Justice way is to find it.

title: Close Call
overview: We follow the aftermath of Erik Lund’s heist when the police knock on his door. As he scrambles to conceal his crime, a single voicemail threatens to unravel his meticulously crafted alibi, leading to a suspenseful confrontation with fate.

title: The Initiate
overview: A gritty whodunit drama that follows Spade, an old-fashioned detective who is on the search for a missing girl called Lucy with the assistance of Casey, his new senior detective. But as these two detectives dig deeper into the case, they are forced to come face to face with the horrors of the modern world.

title: Limitations
overview: When wannabe crime lord Frank is faced with the tied-up man who wronged him (Marc), he tries his absolute best to intimidate, assert his power, and--most importantly--have fun!
tagline: HOW GOOFY CAN ONE CRIMINAL BE?

title: Cassidy Blues
overview: A Bonnie & Clyde criminal couple rob a movie theater on Christmas Eve, and have time to kill before their train, and escape plan, leaves the station; what's the worst that could happen? Enter the detective pair, Brooks and Candy; one of which is struggling with his recent nicotine kick; their only lead: a pack of mysterious cigarettes called Cassidy Blues.
tagline: There's trouble with smoking

title: The Man Who Knifes
overview: A gentleman walking down the street has a horrifying encounter with a knife-wielding madman.

title: Blood Money Blues
overview: An alienated and angry police officer, desperate for money receives a lead on an out of town heroin dealer. He then takes it upon himself to get what he wants.
tagline: I NEED A LEAD, A DEALER FROM OUT OF TOWN WHO HAS MONEY THEY DON'T NECCESARILY NEED.

title: The Epstein Files
overview: The damning files which expose the evil of American billionaire and sex offender Jeffrey Epstein. Tara Brown investigates.

title: Searching the criminal
overview: A detective try to figure out a robbery and question a suspect. Until something happens he didn't expect...

title: The Time Killer
overview: two Policemen are required to investigate a new murder attempt  that happened in town, Who tried to kill the one and only - The time lord?
tagline: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL HOURS...

title: C’est fini le noir
overview: A man and a woman seek to retrieve a mysterious briefcase.
tagline: How old is the Geography professor?

title: A Quiet Matter
overview: A man gets Kidnapped by two incompotent Criminals.

title: Good Times Bad Times
overview: The good times we wished we had lived, might have not been the times we imagined people lived
tagline: Good times that  weren't so good

title: Hurry Monday
overview: After being betrayed on a job, a thief must scramble to fence the stolen gems before her murderous ex partners catch up to her
tagline: After being betrayed on a job, a thief must scramble to fence the stolen gems before her murderous ex partners catch up to her

title: Deep in It
overview: Kevin Hunter a small time thief just released from the penitentiary is back home to take care of his young daughter and ailing mother. With no job in sight and in desperate need of money, Kevin turns to what he knows best but this time he robbed the wrong person and what he has in his possession belongs to a very important and dangerous man that will do anything to get it back. Kevin must figure a way out because now he's deep in it.

title: The Scream
overview: A former bully and his victim are in the same car. As if he’d forgotten all about the past, the victim Min-gyu drops off the bully Tae-won at home. Soon after, the tables are turned with the appearance of unexpected people.

title: Checkmate
overview: The wife of the colonel gets murdered while the local SDO officer was visiting the Colonel house over a game of chess.
tagline: a game of death

title: Carmela's Diary
overview: 'Carmela's diary' tells the story of a 15-year-old girl who lives on the outskirts of Naples and is forced to work for her family's shopping center. Caged in a life that only promises her an uncertain future. Carmela perceives her adolescence as captivity, forced to live as a prisoner by her mother, Maria, who forces her to sell drugs along with her older brother, Ciro. War breaks out amongst the gangs in the neighborhood and Carmela is forced to stay indoors, with the windows well sealed, and give up everything, even one of the things she loves the most, going to school.

title: Vigilante
overview: A parking vigilant catches two possible thiefs. Two detectives are going to fins out who killed them.
tagline: You're in the wrong parking

title: Black or Red
overview: Assigned together, three ambitious young men attempt to pull a heist from an established kingpin and discover the true depths of the grimy criminal underworld.
tagline: Black you're lucky, red not so lucky

title: City of Shadows
overview: World War II has ended, yet a terror still grips the streets. Lead Detective Hank Murphy and partner Joe Branka have exhausted all leads and case files in their search of a ruthless serial killer that is stalking the city streets and killing with no mercy while hiding in the shadows. With the victims increasing by the day and the press coverage adding pressure to the investigation, an unexpected call from a mysterious stranger may be what the Detectives need to close the case and catch the killer.

title: Get Gone
overview: Aaron Walker returns back to his old estate upon hearing about the death of his younger brother Tom who died from a drugs overdose. Aaron is forced to visit his old ways and delves into a life of crime, he soon uncovers some dark secrets about his past which come back to haunt him.

title: Tyst
overview: A young investigator goes to observe a "silent retreat" deep in the forest. There he meets a woman who catches his interest, which complicates his stay. At the same time, he tries to uncover the truth behind another resident's enigmatic behaviour.

title: Tufo
overview: TUFO tells the story of the Cutrò family and their resistence agianst the mafia as witnesses of justice.

title: Der Irland-Krimi: Vergebung
overview: The decades of struggle in Northern Ireland left deep wounds that have not yet healed. Criminal psychologist Cathrin Blake is faced with the delicate task of mediating in a perpetrator-victim conversation.

title: Infidelity
overview: A man hires a private investigator when he suspects infidelity.

title: Mother Goose
overview: A young up-and-coming crook is forced by a mob boss to infiltrate a powerful opposing criminal family, lead by a cutthroat matriarch known as Mother Goose.
tagline: Have you ever seen such a thing in your life?
